channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: A fridge freezer has been dumped on Pillowell Close, 6th January
item.description:
A fridge freezer has been dumped on Pillowell Close. It is on the LHS at the bottom of the straight section heading straight uphill (closest house is no 29).

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 29, Pillowell Close, Oakley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A pothole in road problem, 5th January
